creditline: Collection of David Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description:
[K-03]

scroll has two boxes: original box is in a brown paper sleeve and contains another wooden box; box that contained scroll is a grey cardboard box; fabric is gold with a repeating floral pattern; image is a landscape with a house and fence in LR corner and a three line inscription in the UR corner
title: Small Retreat Among Rivers
